Sentry Irene:
As damages mounted from the war between the Dark Elves and the Elves, we decided to negotiate a cease-fire. For the cease-fire, we designated this place as a Neutral Zone.
But don't think that that means we've reconciled with those holier-than-though Elves! One day, those haughty Elves will pay a great price. But, for now... the Neutral Zone.
